Articles.Content:
hi, i'm a newbie at modding , texturing and this is my first mod

so here we go

engine

next target : fuel tank , decoupler , adapter

my final target would be making a base at mun or another planet so i figure i must build the launcher first

need sugestion please
Ohhh...kayyy...Now, can we have some more info? Like thrust, Isp, weight, fuel required etc?

what is it and why does it look like that.

It's very something, and I can see a style like this going somewhere maybe. Kinda reminds me of that time in Xenogears when Kosmos has a pistol for some reason and it turns out to be a subdimensional anchor to summon forth a gun the size of a small train, complete with space-bipod. Cuz in space, putting a bipod on your gun does anything at all.

it purpose is for the preparation for sending something like this

at the bottom is i think what i like to texture the base

expandable base for something-something , maybe i'll give some satelite disc at the top or maybe more "expand" like a communication tower or more complex animation

sorry for lack of texture and a forgive me because this is my first mod it is lack of quality

i need an idea what a base meant to be

Hey everyone starts somewhere. I think the fact that you got something in game is pretty impressive. I'm sure it feels good to finally succeed if you were like me and spent three hours trying to strangle Unity for being so useless (In fact I recently repeated the sequence). The texture is pretty cool too. It looks like the Xycraft stuff from minecraft to me. Maybe try googling stuff to see what references you can look at in your modelling. Also try explain what you are going for a little better. People here are friendly and are usually helpful. Good luck!
